title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Oct 3 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Oct 3 2022
description:
The nation's most esteemed economist, Art Laffer, author of Taxes Have Consequences: An Income Tax History of the United States, walks us through the disastrous Biden economy, brings us truth and hope. Meteorologist calls Clay and Buck, decries politicization of weather science. Democrats can dump Kamala Harris because she's not popular with black voters. Who will Dems run in '24? Newsom, Harris, Hillary -- or Biden? Latest on Russia-Ukraine war: We're closer to nuclear war than any time since the Cuban Missile Crisis. Caller on Kamala. Buck's alma mater, Amherst College, announces insane new mask policy.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
